title: is it permissible to sit in places where Fatiha is done on food or Dhikr in congregation (bidah)?
transcript: Iran from India asalam Alum shum sh so can I sit at the places of B uh like Dua after prayers and F on fo but not considering at it as a part of Islam basically no you must not associate yourself with Innovation or B or sins in general as per the Ayah number 140 inah chapter 4 because Allah clearly draws the line for us that we must not collaborate we must not participate we must not be in such a congregation until they engage in something that is not sinful it has nothing to do with Innovation it has nothing to do with kufur or shik and Allah Knows Best
